name: Glitch★/グリッチ★
description:
Glitch is a 2d action platform inspired by the titles like Mega Man made by Gustavo (@DexpaceDev) for the A Game By It's Cover 2016 Game Jam (http://agbic.com/)

The game is based on the Famicase cover art Glitch by Thymine / イラストレーター(@PomPomThymine)

"Tired of being sick & defected, a young glitch sets off on a journey to find a solution to the problem."
